entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. 30 percent chance of showers over eastern sections early this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. High 18. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early in the evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing overnight. Fog patches developing before morning. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023
